MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G52 postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.00am to make a permanent repair to a faulty underground cable in Ladybank Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.00am on the 2nd of February 2021.
